summary: Release assets are incorrectly named with Bridge version number (0.0.1) instead of the actual SDK release version. The version in Bridge's Cargo.toml file needs to be updated during pre-release commits.
userImpact: Users downloading release assets receive incorrectly versioned artifacts that don't match the published release version.
rootCause: Bridge's Cargo.toml version number is not synchronized with SDK release version during pre-release process.
proposedFix: Update the version number in Bridge's Cargo.toml file in the pre-release commit.
resolutionDetails: SDK is undergoing rewrite/refresh and this issue no longer applies to current version.
keyQuote: The SDK is undergoing a rewrite/refresh and this issue applied to a previous version and is no longer applicable
